ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisAuthority for the CANADIAN BROADCASTING CORPORATION to lease from ÉDIFICE LE 888 INC., for a term of 15 years, approximately 4.351 square metres of space in the building located at 888 St-Jean Street in Québec City.
